mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-7, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS WEEKLY_DATE, COUNT(*) AS POST_COUNT FROM "POST" WHERE TO_CHAR(POST_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-7, 'YYYY-MM-DD') UNION ALL SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-6, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS WEEKLY_DATE, COUNT(*) AS POST_COUNT FROM "POST" WHERE TO_CHAR(POST_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-6, 'YYYY-MM-DD') UNION ALL SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-5, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS WEEKLY_DATE, COUNT(*) AS POST_COUNT FROM "POST" WHERE TO_CHAR(POST_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-5, 'YYYY-MM-DD') UNION ALL SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-4, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS WEEKLY_DATE, COUNT(*) AS POST_COUNT FROM "POST" WHERE TO_CHAR(POST_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-4, 'YYYY-MM-DD') UNION ALL SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-3, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS WEEKLY_DATE, COUNT(*) AS POST_COUNT FROM "POST" WHERE TO_CHAR(POST_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-5, 'YYYY-MM-DD') UNION ALL SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-2, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS WEEKLY_DATE, COUNT(*) AS POST_COUNT FROM "POST" WHERE TO_CHAR(POST_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-2, 'YYYY-MM-DD') UNION ALL SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-1, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS WEEKLY_DATE, COUNT(*) AS POST_COUNT FROM "POST" WHERE TO_CHAR(POST_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-1, 'YYYY-MM-DD') UNION ALL SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-0, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS WEEKLY_DATE, COUNT(*) AS POST_COUNT FROM "POST" WHERE TO_CHAR(POST_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-0, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
SELECT TOPIC_NAME, COUNT(GROUP_NO) AS GROUP_COUNT FROM "GROUP" JOIN "GROUP_TOPIC" USING(TOPIC_CODE) GROUP BY TOPIC_NAME

SELECT TO_CHAR(SIGNUP_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS WEEKLY_DATE, COUNT(MEMBER_NAME) MEMBER_SIGNUP_COUNT FROM "MEMBER" WHERE SIGNUP_DATE >= SYSDATE - 7 GROUP BY TO_CHAR(SIGNUP_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ORDER BY WEEKLY_DATE ASC

SELECT TO_CHAR(SIGNUP_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS WEEKLY_DATE, COUNT(MEMBER_NAME) MEMBER_DEL_COUNT FROM "MEMBER" WHERE SIGNUP_DATE >= SYSDATE - 7 AND MEMBER_STATUS = 2 GROUP BY TO_CHAR(SIGNUP_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ORDER BY WEEKLY_DATE ASC

SELECT (SELECT COUNT(MEMBER_NO) FROM "MEMBER" WHERE MEMBER_STATUS IN ('0', '1')) AS TOTAL_MEMBER_COUNT, (SELECT COUNT(GROUP_NO) FROM "GROUP" WHERE GROUP_STATUS IN ('0', '1')) AS TOTAL_GROUP_COUNT, (SELECT COUNT(POST_NO) FROM "POST" WHERE POST_DEL_YN = 'Y') AS TOTAL_POST_COUNT FROM DUAL

SELECT (SELECT COUNT(MEMBER_NO) FROM "MEMBER" WHERE MEMBER_STATUS IN ('0', '1') AND TO_CHAR(SIGNUP_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) AS TODAY_MEMBER_COUNT, -- (SELECT COUNT(GROUP_NO) FROM "GROUP" WHERE GROUP_STATUS IN ('0', '1') AND TO_CHAR(GROUP_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) AS TODAY_GROUP_COUNT, -- (SELECT COUNT(POST_NO) FROM "POST" WHERE POST_DEL_YN = 'Y' AND TO_CHAR(POST_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) AS TODAY_POST_COUNT, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS TODAY_DATE FROM DUAL
